contracts.name: Okinoko Escrow
contracts.description: The contract provides an on-chain escrow mechanism between two parties with an optional third-party arbitrator to resolve disputes.

functions.name: e_decide
functions.description: If you are part of the escrow you can send your desicion. Until the escorw is closed you can change that decision.
